Node.definition: = nation and their territory; ◄ regarded as founded by one of the sons of Ham (חָם) with the same name
= deity; ► God of Israel who revealed himself to Moses
= action by which humans ride on a domestic animal such as a donkey (חֲמֹור) or a horse (סוּס) or in a chariot (מֶרְכָּבָה)
= mass of visible, condensed watery vapor floating in the air; ► producing rain; ≈ God is said to envelop himself with clouds
= state in which humans, animals, and things have the ability to move or act with speed ◄ due to lack of weight, agility, strength, training, or energy
= nation and their territory; ◄ regarded as founded by one of the sons of Ham (חָם) with the same name

= a physical likeness or representation of a person, animal, or thing; ◄ usually made from stone or wood overlaid with gold or silver; ► functioning as an object of non sanctioned worship; ≈ associated with being worthless and useless
= nation and their territory; ◄ regarded as founded by one of the sons of Ham (חָם) with the same name
literally: heart; hence: = the seat of knowledge, human reasoning, planning, intelligence, skill, affection and hatred, desire and satisfaction, humility and pride, courage and fear, joy and grief
= nation and their territory; ◄ regarded as founded by one of the sons of Ham (חָם) with the same name
literally: (one's) heart melts; hence: = state in which humans lose all courage
= action of agitating or provoking a strong reaction or emotion in another, often angry or harmful
= nation and their territory; ◄ regarded as founded by one of the sons of Ham (חָם) with the same name
= nation and their territory; ◄ regarded as founded by one of the sons of Ham (חָם) with the same name
= action by which humans or deities engage in a confrontation with (other) humans

Node.gloss: a man ... his brother > one ... each other
Node.definition: = expression denoting a situation in which two people or objects that are regarded as masculine are involved in a reciprocal event
= someone with whom a person has some level of association, for example, by geography, social or ethnic grouping, personal connection, or temporary circumstance

= relatively large and permanent population center, usually surrounded by a wall and surrounded by a number of dependent villages (חָצֵר) settlements (בַּת) and pasturelands (מִגְרָשׁ) ≈ associated with strength and security

= relatively large and permanent population center, usually surrounded by a wall and surrounded by a number of dependent villages (חָצֵר) settlements (בַּת) and pasturelands (מִגְרָשׁ) ≈ associated with strength and security
= to act forcibly on something, ► so as to cause it to become waste and/or desolate
= inner person of a human or celestial being, associated with emotions, such as joy, grief, worry, courage, anger, willingness, etc.
= nation and their territory; ◄ regarded as founded by one of the sons of Ham (חָם) with the same name
exact meaning unsure; possibly: = causative action by which someone causes a mind event not to produce the expected outcome
= action by which humans request information from a deity or other spiritual being, usually through the intermediary of a priest, prophet, or medium

= a physical likeness or representation of a person, animal, or thing; ◄ usually made from stone or wood overlaid with gold or silver; ► functioning as an object of non sanctioned worship; ≈ associated with being worthless and useless
= dead persons, ► consulted usually for fortune telling
= spirit of a dead person, ► consulted by fortune tellers; ≈ an activity forbidden in the law of Moses
= spirit of a dead person, ► consulted by fortune tellers; ≈ an activity forbidden in the law of Moses

marker identifying the entity that is directly targeted by the event in focus, and which usually is already part of the cognitive context; described in syntactic terms as the direct object marker; untranslatable in English unless accompanied by a suffix
= nation and their territory; ◄ regarded as founded by one of the sons of Ham (חָם) with the same name
literally: hand; hence: = state of being in a position of control and authority over objects or people
= man who is in a position of authority over another person or object as a legal owner, employer, husband, or sovereign; or a person or deity who is referred to as such in a conversation or prayer
literally: hard; hence: = state in which words and actions lack gentleness
= supreme secular and male ruler of a nation or people; ≈ associated with authority, power, honor, but also with justice; also used as a reference to one's deity
= state in which a person, animal, substance, or force has the ability to exert great force
= man who is in a position of authority over another person or object as a legal owner, employer, husband, or sovereign; or a person or deity who is referred to as such in a conversation or prayer
= deity; ► God of Israel who revealed himself to Moses

literally: YHWH (or one of the other names of God of a combination thereof) of Hosts; hence: = epithet of God with focus on his being in charge of the host of heavenly beings surrounding his throne, praising him, and carrying out his will in earth; ≈ as an epithet it relates to God's power and control of the cosmos as the divine king and warrior
literally: the sea; hence: = a large river flowing from the south to the north through Egypt into the Mediterranean Sea
= large body of flowing water; ◄ located in Egypt (מִצְרַיִם) ► very important to transportation, irrigation, and life in Egypt

= process by which a body of water or place that was formerly covered with moisture dries up, ◄ as a result of evaporation or draining; ► in the case of land, if this condition persists, sedentary life will become impossible
= process by which objects containing liquid essential to their existence lose these liquids ◄ due to some external or internal cause
= process by which an object acquires characteristics that are considered unacceptable
= large body of flowing water; ◄ located in Egypt (מִצְרַיִם) ► very important to transportation, irrigation, and life in Egypt
= process by which the height of a body of water is diminished ◄ due to a drought

= process by which a body of water or place that was formerly covered with moisture dries up, ◄ as a result of evaporation or draining; ► in the case of land, if this condition persists, sedentary life will become impossible
= a body of water flowing to and from the Nile river, whether in the form of a manmade canal or a subsidiary river branch, especially those of the Nile delta region
= another name for Egypt (מִצְרַיִם)

= a tall grass with stiff, sharply pointed leaves and a plume like flower head that reaches to more than 2 m; it grows in lakes and streams, the roots creeping across the bottom of the lake to produce new leaves and stalks; or on riverbanks; ◄ Phragmites australis (Common reed) or Arundo donax (Giant reed); ► used for baskets, mats, flutes, pens, arrows, and roof coverings; ≈ symbol of weakness and undependability, but also flexibility

meaning unsure; probably: = a reed like plant, which grows in water and reaches a height of up to 3 m high; its fuzzy brown seed head becomes fluffy and blows away in the wind; ◄ Typha genus; ► used for baskets and mats; its roots are edible
= process by which plants dry up and die ◄ for lack of water; usually associated with grief, hardship, and punishment from God
= a place with little or no vegetation|= type of grass; ◄ found on the borders of the Nile (יְאֹר)
= a river ◄ flowing through Egypt from south to north; ► overflowing its banks each year and providing fertility for the fields on both sides; ≈ generally associated with Egypt's power and prosperity
= the furthest or most extreme part of something
= a river ◄ flowing through Egypt from south to north; ► overflowing its banks each year and providing fertility for the fields on both sides; ≈ generally associated with Egypt's power and prosperity
= land that is being sown, either by hand or by being flooded by water that contains seeds
= a river ◄ flowing through Egypt from south to north; ► overflowing its banks each year and providing fertility for the fields on both sides; ≈ generally associated with Egypt's power and prosperity
= process by which objects containing liquid essential to their existence lose these liquids ◄ due to some external or internal cause
= process by which the wind causes objects to be moved from one place to the other

Node.gloss: there is not|it is not|it does not
Node.definition: = state in which an object or event is either absent or non existant
= action by which humans give expression to their grief, ◄ caused by death of a relative or friend or by extreme hardship
= a person who catches fish for a living
= to experience grief and show this by one's actions; ◄ caused by bereavement, loss, or other difficult circumstances
= a river ◄ flowing through Egypt from south to north; ► overflowing its banks each year and providing fertility for the fields on both sides; ≈ generally associated with Egypt's power and prosperity
= wooden rod about the length of a man, with a metal or bone point with barbs on one end, and a rope on the other end; ► thrown at fish or aquatic animals to kill and catch them
= causative action by which humans spread out an object, such as a piece of cloth, a net, or a document either horizontally or vertically

= circular net with weights and a draw rope around its edge of roughly 6 7.5 meters in diameter; ► thrown from a boat or the shore in a circular motion so that it lands with the net fully spread out on the water; the weights carry it down, trapping fish underneath; then the fisherman uses the draw rope to close the net and pull it back to himself; ≈ associated with aggression and control

= state of being unable to function as can be expected; ◄ as a result of destruction, a drought, or God's direct intervention; ► results include weakness, sadness, shame, death, and disintegration, depending on the situation

Node.gloss: to be ashamed|to come to shame|to be put to shame|to be disappointed
Node.definition: = state in which someone has forfeited the respect of the community, due to a situation that is not in accordance to someone's status

Node.gloss: to work|to till|to plow (soil, flax)|to dress (a vineyard)
Node.definition: literally, to serve; therefore = action by which workers prepare land of planting and harvesting; also refers to caring for a vineyard, processing linen, or using cattle for working the land

= product of a plant of about a meter tall; its leaves are narrow and the flowers are bright blue with five petals; ► the seed capsule contains oil; after the plants have ripened they are uprooted and the stalks are left to dry for a while; they are then soaked, dried, and beaten to separate the fibers, which are then combed and woven into linen cloth
= person whose occupation is weaving fabric
= white cloth; ◄ woven out of either linen or cotton; ► used for making clothes or to decorate the house; ≈ regarded as valuable and therefore symbolizing high status
literally: to crush; hence: = causative action by which someone causes someone else to suffer harm and humiliation, ◄ which feels as if one has been crushed with a heavy object
literally: to do; hence; = action by which humans and engaged in a specific activity, usually in the service of someone else
literally: to do wages; hence: = action by which humans make their services available to other humans for a limited amount of time and in return for payment
= process of experiencing grief; ◄ as a result of difficult circumstances

literally: throat, as the part of the body that contains the passage ways for blood, air, and food; hence: = the life principle that animates both humans and animals, turns them into breathing living beings, and functions as the center of their personality, mind, physical and non physical desires, courage, emotions, and affections; it is believed to reside in the blood
= particle marking a constituent as prominent, as if limiting the focus to a restricted number of entities
= pertaining to being foolish, which manifests itself in a lack of fear of God, unwillingness to listen to advice, much talking, and being unable to conceal one's emotions
= someone in a position of authority in an army, at a royal court, of a town, within a family, among priests, or elsewhere
= town; ◄ located in Nile (יְאֹר) delta of Egypt (מִצְרַיִם) ► Egyptian capital during 21st and 22nd dynasties; administrative centre of Lower Egypt
= state in which humans, deities or animals have a certain level of wisdom, intelligence, or proficiency
= a person whose official role and responsibility it is to give advice to someone in authority
= king of Egypt

Node.gloss: to be dull|to be stupid|to be coarse|to be brutish
Node.definition: = state in which someone lacks intelligence, refinement and culture

= referent to the way in which an event is performed; ► normally with the intention of finding out how, but often used in rhetorical questions in order to express one's conviction that that event in question cannot be performed at all (under the given circumstances)

Node.gloss: to say|to speak|to tell|to command|to think|to call
Node.definition: = action by which humans and deities utter words; this can happen within their minds and be inaudible to others, but in most cases the words are spoken out loud in order to communicate something to others; usually directly followed by the actual words that are spoken
= king of Egypt
= direct or indirect human offspring, either male or indeterminate, either biologically or through adoption
= state in which humans, deities or animals have a certain level of wisdom, intelligence, or proficiency
= referent to the speaker or writer in a discourse
= direct or indirect human offspring, either male or indeterminate, either biologically or through adoption
= supreme secular and male ruler of a nation or people; ≈ associated with authority, power, honor, but also with justice; also used as a reference to one's deity

= referent to an unknown location; ► normally used with the purpose of finding which location that is; sometimes used in rhetorical questions expressing one's conviction that such a location cannot be found
= state in which humans, deities or animals have a certain level of wisdom, intelligence, or proficiency
= particle linking two propositions, by which Y represents the purpose or result of X
= process by which humans or deities acquire information about other humans, deities, or certain facts, which is stored in the mind

= a reference to an unknown object or event; normally used with the purpose of identifying that object; sometimes used in rhetorical questions expressing one's conviction that that object or event cannot be identified
= action by which humans or deities exercise their minds to determine how they are going to achieve a particular purpose
= deity; ► God of Israel who revealed himself to Moses

literally: YHWH (or one of the other names of God of a combination thereof) of Hosts; hence: = epithet of God with focus on his being in charge of the host of heavenly beings surrounding his throne, praising him, and carrying out his will in earth; ≈ as an epithet it relates to God's power and control of the cosmos as the divine king and warrior
= nation and their territory; ◄ regarded as founded by one of the sons of Ham (חָם) with the same name

Node.gloss: to be foolish|to be ignorant|to be without understanding
Node.definition: = to be and/or behave like one with little insight, education or wisdom; ≈ pejorative (see the related term אִוֶּלֶת (אִוֶּלֶת)
= someone in a position of authority in an army, at a royal court, of a town, within a family, among priests, or elsewhere
= town; ◄ located in Nile (יְאֹר) delta of Egypt (מִצְרַיִם) ► Egyptian capital during 21st and 22nd dynasties; administrative centre of Lower Egypt
= passive action by which a person is fooled or deceived
= someone in a position of authority in an army, at a royal court, of a town, within a family, among priests, or elsewhere
= town, also known as Memphis; ◄ in Egypt (מִצְרַיִם) ► residence and capital of many of its kings (ABD)

marker identifying the entity that is directly targeted by the event in focus, and which usually is already part of the cognitive context; described in syntactic terms as the direct object marker; untranslatable in English unless accompanied by a suffix
= nation and their territory; ◄ regarded as founded by one of the sons of Ham (חָם) with the same name
= group of clans (מִשְׁפָּחָה) united by a common leader
= deity; ► God of Israel who revealed himself to Moses

Node.gloss: to mix within|to pour out upon|to cause to experience
Node.definition: literally: to mix (an attitude within a group); hence: = causative action by which deities cause humans to experience a certain attitude or emotion
= inner person of a human or celestial being, associated with emotions, such as joy, grief, worry, courage, anger, willingness, etc.
= state of being flawed or distorted

marker identifying the entity that is directly targeted by the event in focus, and which usually is already part of the cognitive context; described in syntactic terms as the direct object marker; untranslatable in English unless accompanied by a suffix
= nation and their territory; ◄ regarded as founded by one of the sons of Ham (חָם) with the same name
= state in which humans are intoxicated ◄ as a result of having had too much alcohol
= food or other items expelled from the stomach ◄ due to excessive alcohol consumption; ≈ associated with behavior inviting ridicule
= nation and their territory; ◄ regarded as founded by one of the sons of Ham (חָם) with the same name
= a linker introducing a proposition that gives additional information regarding an explicit or implicit object, location, time, or manner

Node.gloss: to do|to perform|to commit|to practice|to observe|to celebrate|to keep
Node.definition: = action by which humans or deities engage in a particular action

= upper part of the human body, or the front or upper part of the body of an animal, typically separated from the rest of the body by a neck, and containing the brain, mouth, and sense organs; ≈ associated with the entire person, that person's life, and that person's responsibilities
literally: tail (of society); hence: = people with a relatively low social status

Node.gloss: palm brach and reed|everyone, whether great or small
Node.definition: literally: palm branch and reed; hence: = people of all layers in the society, including those belonging to the nobility (i.e. the palm branch) and those that are part of the lower classes (i.e. the reed)

Node.gloss: palm brach and reed|everyone, whether great or small
Node.definition: literally: palm branch and reed; hence: = people of all layers in the society, including those belonging to the nobility (i.e. the palm branch) and those that are part of the lower classes (i.e. the reed)

= a basic unit of time, including evening (עֶרֶב) and morning (בֹּקֶר) seven days make a week (שְׁבוּעָה) sometimes used in a figurative sense referring to a limited period of time, which may be shorter or slightly longer than a single day; the context often makes it difficult to determine
= referent to a male person or another object that is considered masculine
= nation and their territory; ◄ regarded as founded by one of the sons of Ham (חָם) with the same name
= woman of marriagable age or older, whether married or not
= state/process by which humans experience a strong fear, usually accompanied by shaking and trembling
literally: waving of (one's) hand (against someone); hence: = action by which deities engage in an act of violence against humans
= deity; ► God of Israel who revealed himself to Moses

literally: YHWH (or one of the other names of God of a combination thereof) of Hosts; hence: = epithet of God with focus on his being in charge of the host of heavenly beings surrounding his throne, praising him, and carrying out his will in earth; ≈ as an epithet it relates to God's power and control of the cosmos as the divine king and warrior
= a linker introducing a proposition that gives additional information regarding an explicit or implicit object, location, time, or manner
= referent to a male person or another object that is considered masculine

= the surface of the earth, containing the substance that God used to create animals and humans, and to which they return when they die; on this surface plants and trees grow, humans labor to grow crops and worship God, who sustains all life, but who can also strike it with a curse so that nothing grows again

= man, tribe, and territory; ◄ fourth son of Jacob (יַעֲקֹב) and Leah (לֵאָה) ► founder of tribe of Israel (יִשְׂרָאֵל) which became a separate kingdom (opposed to Israel) after the death of Solomon (שְׁלֹמֹה) and, after the exile, a separate administrative district
= nation and their territory; ◄ regarded as founded by one of the sons of Ham (חָם) with the same name
= something that inspires fear in other people
= a linker introducing a proposition that gives additional information regarding an explicit or implicit object, location, time, or manner
= causative action by which humans or deities cause information that is stored in someone else's mind to be reprocessed by speaking about it

marker identifying the entity that is directly targeted by the event in focus, and which usually is already part of the cognitive context; described in syntactic terms as the direct object marker; untranslatable in English unless accompanied by a suffix
= deity; ► God of Israel who revealed himself to Moses

literally: YHWH (or one of the other names of God of a combination thereof) of Hosts; hence: = epithet of God with focus on his being in charge of the host of heavenly beings surrounding his throne, praising him, and carrying out his will in earth; ≈ as an epithet it relates to God's power and control of the cosmos as the divine king and warrior
= a linker introducing a proposition that gives additional information regarding an explicit or implicit object, location, time, or manner
= referent to a male person or another object that is considered masculine
= action by which humans or deities exercise their minds to determine how they are going to achieve a particular purpose

= a basic unit of time, including evening (עֶרֶב) and morning (בֹּקֶר) seven days make a week (שְׁבוּעָה) sometimes used in a figurative sense referring to a limited period of time, which may be shorter or slightly longer than a single day; the context often makes it difficult to determine
= referent to a male person or another object that is considered masculine
= state in which a countable entity is five in number

= relatively large and permanent population center, usually surrounded by a wall and surrounded by a number of dependent villages (חָצֵר) settlements (בַּת) and pasturelands (מִגְרָשׁ) ≈ associated with strength and security

= the earth as opposed to the sky; sometimes used in a more specific sense to denote part of the earth, such as the dry land as opposed to the sea, or a specific region, area, country, or plot of land
= nation and their territory; ◄ regarded as founded by one of the sons of Ham (חָם) with the same name

= action by which humans and deities utter words; this can happen within their minds and be inaudible to others, but in most cases the words are spoken out loud in order to communicate something to others; usually not directly followed by the actual words that are spoken
= the region inhabited by people who were regarded as descendants of Canaan, son of Ham (חָם) son of Noah (נֹחַ) settled by Abram (אַבְרָם)
= action by which humans or deities use an oath to solemnly declare that they will be true to other humans or deities
= deity; ► God of Israel who revealed himself to Moses

literally: YHWH (or one of the other names of God of a combination thereof) of Hosts; hence: = epithet of God with focus on his being in charge of the host of heavenly beings surrounding his throne, praising him, and carrying out his will in earth; ≈ as an epithet it relates to God's power and control of the cosmos as the divine king and warrior

= relatively large and permanent population center, usually surrounded by a wall and surrounded by a number of dependent villages (חָצֵר) settlements (בַּת) and pasturelands (מִגְרָשׁ) ≈ associated with strength and security

= state in which something is in extreme disrepair ◄ caused by either neglect or destruction|literally: City of the Sun; hence: = town, normally known as On (אֹון) but referred to in Greek as Heliopolis: City of the Sun; ◄ located in Lower Egypt (מִצְרַיִם) ► seat of worship of solar deities, such as Re and Atum

Node.gloss: to say|to speak|to tell|to command|to think|to call
Node.definition: = action by which humans and deities utter words; this can happen within their minds and be inaudible to others, but in most cases the words are spoken out loud in order to communicate something to others; usually directly followed by the actual words that are spoken
= state in which a countable entity is one in number

= a basic unit of time, including evening (עֶרֶב) and morning (בֹּקֶר) seven days make a week (שְׁבוּעָה) sometimes used in a figurative sense referring to a limited period of time, which may be shorter or slightly longer than a single day; the context often makes it difficult to determine
= referent to a male person or another object that is considered masculine
= construction with a flat top, ◄ originally made out of stones that were not cut and shaped with tools, later also out of metal; ► used for burning sacrifices
= deity; ► God of Israel who revealed himself to Moses

= the earth as opposed to the sky; sometimes used in a more specific sense to denote part of the earth, such as the dry land as opposed to the sea, or a specific region, area, country, or plot of land
= nation and their territory; ◄ regarded as founded by one of the sons of Ham (חָם) with the same name
= a column ◄ that was usually made of a single stone; whether with inscriptions or not, ► used as the memorial of an event that had happened at the place where the stone stood
relational indicating a location in the direct vicinity of the point of reference
= a set of limits that separates part of a whole from other parts, with focus either on the limits itself or on the area or object surrounded by it
= deity; ► God of Israel who revealed himself to Moses
= object or event that reminds of something that has happened or as a confirmation of something that is yet to happen
= an object that functions as evidence or proof that something has taken place or that some decision has been made
= deity; ► God of Israel who revealed himself to Moses

literally: YHWH (or one of the other names of God of a combination thereof) of Hosts; hence: = epithet of God with focus on his being in charge of the host of heavenly beings surrounding his throne, praising him, and carrying out his will in earth; ≈ as an epithet it relates to God's power and control of the cosmos as the divine king and warrior

= the earth as opposed to the sky; sometimes used in a more specific sense to denote part of the earth, such as the dry land as opposed to the sea, or a specific region, area, country, or plot of land
= nation and their territory; ◄ regarded as founded by one of the sons of Ham (חָם) with the same name
= deity; ► God of Israel who revealed himself to Moses
= causative action by which humans cause hardship to other humans
= causative action by which humans or deities commission one or more agents to go to a certain individual or place in order to perform a certain task
= causative action by which humans or deities come to the help of humans in need, whether in military, civil or judicial contexts

Node.gloss: to plead (another's cause)|to defend|to take up (another's) cause
Node.definition: = action by which humans or deities resolve a conflict for their own benefit or for the benefit of (other) humans who may not be in a position to do that for themselves
= causative action by which humans or deities remove (other) humans or objects from a dangerous or life threatening situation
= action by which humans or deities reveal information about themselves to (other) humans
= deity; ► God of Israel who revealed himself to Moses
= nation and their territory; ◄ regarded as founded by one of the sons of Ham (חָם) with the same name
literally: to know (God); hence: = action by which humans, either as individuals or as groups, assume a position of subservience towards a deity
= nation and their territory; ◄ regarded as founded by one of the sons of Ham (חָם) with the same name

marker identifying the entity that is directly targeted by the event in focus, and which usually is already part of the cognitive context; described in syntactic terms as the direct object marker; untranslatable in English unless accompanied by a suffix
= deity; ► God of Israel who revealed himself to Moses

= a basic unit of time, including evening (עֶרֶב) and morning (בֹּקֶר) seven days make a week (שְׁבוּעָה) sometimes used in a figurative sense referring to a limited period of time, which may be shorter or slightly longer than a single day; the context often makes it difficult to determine
= referent to a male person or another object that is considered masculine

= action by which humans, either as individuals or as groups, assume a position of subservience towards a deity, perform the required rituals, and live in accordance with the requirements of that deity

= the human activity of killing one or more animals as a religious sacrifice; usually part of the animal is offered to the deity and part is eaten by the worshipers; often accompanied by the burning of incense
= a generic terms for an offering made to a deity

Node.gloss: to make a vow|to solemnly promise
Node.definition: = action by which humans make a solemn promise to a deity ► to signal a commitment to perform a certain act or behave in a specific way, usually in return for a blessing from the deity
= action by which humans make a solemn promise to a deity, ► which signals a commitment to perform a certain act or behave in a specific way, usually in return for a blessing from the deity
= deity; ► God of Israel who revealed himself to Moses
= causative action by which humans or animals deliver a heavy blow to other humans or animals, ► resulting in serious harm or injury, and, in the case of an army, defeat
= deity; ► God of Israel who revealed himself to Moses

marker identifying the entity that is directly targeted by the event in focus, and which usually is already part of the cognitive context; described in syntactic terms as the direct object marker; untranslatable in English unless accompanied by a suffix
= nation and their territory; ◄ regarded as founded by one of the sons of Ham (חָם) with the same name
= causative action by which humans or animals deliver a heavy blow to other humans or animals, ► resulting in serious harm or injury, and, in the case of an army, defeat

= causative action by which humans or deities help or cause (other) humans to be restored to health or physical strength after a disease or an accident; this could also refer to the wound or disease itself
literally: to turn (to someone); hence: = action by which humans or deities associate with other humans or deities, often to look for or to provide help and support
particle linking an event to a point in space; = relation indicating that event X ends at point in space Y
= deity; ► God of Israel who revealed himself to Moses
literally: to be asked; hence: = action by which deities listen to the prayer of humans and respond to it

= causative action by which humans or deities help or cause (other) humans to be restored to health or physical strength after a disease or an accident; this could also refer to the wound or disease itself

= a basic unit of time, including evening (עֶרֶב) and morning (בֹּקֶר) seven days make a week (שְׁבוּעָה) sometimes used in a figurative sense referring to a limited period of time, which may be shorter or slightly longer than a single day; the context often makes it difficult to determine
= referent to a male person or another object that is considered masculine
= a relatively wide road or access ramp made by by covering the surface of the ground with thicks layers of sand
= nation and their territory; ◄ regarded as founded by one of the sons of Ham (חָם) with the same name
= nation; ◄ located in Northern Mesopotamia with Nineveh (נִינְוֵה) as its capital; regarded as descendants of Shem (שֵׁם)
= nation; ◄ located in Northern Mesopotamia with Nineveh (נִינְוֵה) as its capital; regarded as descendants of Shem (שֵׁם)
= nation and their territory; ◄ regarded as founded by one of the sons of Ham (חָם) with the same name
= nation and their territory; ◄ regarded as founded by one of the sons of Ham (חָם) with the same name
= nation; ◄ located in Northern Mesopotamia with Nineveh (נִינְוֵה) as its capital; regarded as descendants of Shem (שֵׁם)

= action by which humans, either as individuals or as groups, assume a position of subservience towards a deity, perform the required rituals, and live in accordance with the requirements of that deity
= nation and their territory; ◄ regarded as founded by one of the sons of Ham (חָם) with the same name

marker identifying the entity that is directly targeted by the event in focus, and which usually is already part of the cognitive context; described in syntactic terms as the direct object marker; untranslatable in English unless accompanied by a suffix
= nation; ◄ located in Northern Mesopotamia with Nineveh (נִינְוֵה) as its capital; regarded as descendants of Shem (שֵׁם)

= a basic unit of time, including evening (עֶרֶב) and morning (בֹּקֶר) seven days make a week (שְׁבוּעָה) sometimes used in a figurative sense referring to a limited period of time, which may be shorter or slightly longer than a single day; the context often makes it difficult to determine
= referent to a male person or another object that is considered masculine

= man, also known as Jacob (יַעֲקֹב) and Jeshurun (יְשֻׁרוּן) including the ethnic group that is regarded to be his descendants; ◄ son of Isaac (יִצְחָק) and Rebekah (רִבְקָה) brother of Esau (עֵשָׂו) and ► father of twelve sons after whom the tribes of Israel were named and one daughter
= state in which a countable entity is the third in a range
= nation and their territory; ◄ regarded as founded by one of the sons of Ham (חָם) with the same name
= nation; ◄ located in Northern Mesopotamia with Nineveh (נִינְוֵה) as its capital; regarded as descendants of Shem (שֵׁם)
= action by which deities grant a special favor to humans, objects, and events, or by which humans invoke a deity to do the same

= the earth as opposed to the sky; sometimes used in a more specific sense to denote part of the earth, such as the dry land as opposed to the sea, or a specific region, area, country, or plot of land
= a linker introducing a proposition that gives additional information regarding an explicit or implicit object, location, time, or manner

Node.gloss: to bless|to praise|to greet|to congratulate|to commend
Node.definition: = causative action by which deities grant a special favor to humans, objects, or events, or by which humans invoke a deity to do the same
= deity; ► God of Israel who revealed himself to Moses

literally: YHWH (or one of the other names of God of a combination thereof) of Hosts; hence: = epithet of God with focus on his being in charge of the host of heavenly beings surrounding his throne, praising him, and carrying out his will in earth; ≈ as an epithet it relates to God's power and control of the cosmos as the divine king and warrior

Node.gloss: to say|to speak|to tell|to command|to think|to call
Node.definition: = action by which humans and deities utter words; this can happen within their minds and be inaudible to others, but in most cases the words are spoken out loud in order to communicate something to others; usually directly followed by the actual words that are spoken

Node.gloss: to bless|to praise|to greet|to congratulate|to commend
Node.definition: = causative action by which deities grant a special favor to humans, objects, or events, or by which humans invoke a deity to do the same
= nation and their territory; ◄ regarded as founded by one of the sons of Ham (חָם) with the same name
literally: hand, used metonymically to denote the owner of the hand; hence: = the person who is the originator of a particular event
= nation; ◄ located in Northern Mesopotamia with Nineveh (נִינְוֵה) as its capital; regarded as descendants of Shem (שֵׁם)

= man, also known as Jacob (יַעֲקֹב) and Jeshurun (יְשֻׁרוּן) including the ethnic group that is regarded to be his descendants; ◄ son of Isaac (יִצְחָק) and Rebekah (רִבְקָה) brother of Esau (עֵשָׂו) and ► father of twelve sons after whom the tribes of Israel were named and one daughter
